mapper.select: select mm.UserID as userId, mm.Name as name, case when mm.MemberType ='T' THEN mt.HakwonCode else mh.HakwonCode end as hakwonCode, case when mm.MemberType ='T' THEN mt.TeacherCode else ' ' end as teacherCode from MEM_Member mm left join MEM_Hakwon mh on mm.Code =mh.HakwonCode and mm.MemberType ='H' left join Mem_Teacher mt on mm.Code =mt.TeacherCode and mm.MemberType ='T' where UserID =#{userId} and Pwd =#{password}

select count(*) from MEM_Member mm left join MEM_Hakwon mh on mm.Code =mh.HakwonCode and mm.MemberType ='H' left join Mem_Teacher mt on mm.Code =mt.TeacherCode and mm.MemberType ='T' where UserID =#{userId} and Pwd =#{password}
